name: meteor-beam
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sword-shield: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers space power and boosts its Sp. Atk stat, then attacks the target on the next turn.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers space power and boosts its Sp. Atk stat, then attacks the target on the next turn.
